Complainant.Name: XYZ
Complainant.Details: Owner of 'Maa Saraswati Telecom' mobile shop.

Output_A.Incident_facts: The complainant, XYZ, closed his mobile shop 'Maa Saraswati Telecom' at 8 PM on 11/07/2020. On 12/07/2020, at 9 AM, he found the shop broken into via the upper exhaust fan/asbestos roof sheet. Cash amounting to Rs. 8000, two new mobile phones (IMEI: 000000000000000/111111111111111 and 222222222222222/333333333333333), and five old mobile phones given for repair were stolen. The incident occurred at LC 14 Railway Gate, near ZZ Market.

Output_B.reason: Sections IPC 379 (theft) and IPC 461 (dishonestly breaking open receptacle containing property) match the typical sections for theft/robbery.
